name: Xangati
tag_list: virtualization, netflow, broadband, sla, security, network
overview:
Xangati, derived from the Sanskrit word “Sangati” meaning community; gathering together with the highest intention of learning, is the industry’s leading Application Management 2.0 solution for both service providers and IT organizations.

Over the past few decades, applications and networks have evolved from running on static infrastructures to incredibly dynamic infrastructures that now include virtualization. Xangati has applied prominent Web 2.0 concepts like streaming, collaboration and user-generated content into a comprehensive system for managing networks and applications that exist in today’s dynamic 2.0 world.

Xangati, Inc. was founded in 2006 and has been recognized by InfoWorld as a Top Tech Start Up for 2008 and by Network World as a Top IT Management Software Company.

funding_rounds.source_description: Xangati raises $10.7M to identify delivery problems in corporate networks.
